pullRequest.body:
Move its lemmas (mostly) to two new files:
* `Algebra.Order.Group.Basic` for the lemmas about group-like objects
* `Algebra.Order.Ring.Basic` for the lemmas about ring-like objects


---

This seems like an improvement; please put on the queue with these changes
This looks a bit suspicious... was this a transitive import via `Mathlib.Algebra.GroupPower.Order`?

This is pretty funny. The import is not actually required, but minimize_imports thinks it is unless you change
```diff
-  rw [mem_divisorsAntidiagonal, mem_divisorsAntidiagonal, mul_comm, Prod.swap]
+  rw [mem_divisorsAntidiagonal, mem_divisorsAntidiagonal, mul_comm, Prod.fst_swap, Prod.snd_swap]
```
because `Prod.swap.eq_1` ends up being generated lazily in `Mathlib.Order.GameAdd`.

So:
```suggestion
```

(In fact, `Mathlib.Algebra.Order.Ring.Basic` can be removed easily by replacing `pow_lt_pow_iff_right` â†’ `Nat.pow_lt_pow_iff_right`, but please don't do that in this PR)

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: Split `Algebra.GroupPower.Order`
